Packagist updated their download statistics, which make this project redundant. Check out Laravel's download statistics on packagist.org .

June 2013

Laravel v4.0 was the most popular version in June 2013. It has been downloaded 1'980 times. Thats 100% of all downloads!

In total, Laravel has been downloaded 1'980 times this month.
